meanings.definition: A mechanism on a firearm that ignites the propellant
meanings.sent1: The gunlock clicked as the trigger was pulled, firing the bullet.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the gunlock before going hunting to ensure it functions properly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to play with the gunlock, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a faulty gunlock, unpredictable and sudden.
meanings.sent5: The gunlock, like a tiny spark in the dark, set off the explosive reaction.

meanings.definition: To lock or secure a gun
meanings.sent1: He needed to gunlock the rifle before storing it away safely.
meanings.sent2: Remember to always gunlock your weapon when not in use.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly threatened to gunlock the pistol to keep it away from her brother.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed was like a strong grip trying to gunlock his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The soldier quickly moved to gunlock the gate, preventing any unauthorized entry.
